== WordPress 1.2.2 ==

Released 2004-12-15 to address security issues and a few bugs. [http://wordpress.org/development/2004/12/one-point-two-two/ Release post]. Note if you're running PHP5 you may need to apply [http://wordpress.org/support/2/12138#post-84189 this fix].
